byline.contributor: Gaia Pianigiani and Elisabetta Povoledo contributed reporting from Rome.

abstract: News Analysis; apostolic exhortation released by Pope Francis and titled Amoris Laetitia, or The Joy of Love, suggests answers to some of Catholic Church's most pressing questions are best found locally; Francis has long been proponent of approach, known as 'collegiality'.
lead_paragraph: Rather than dictating policy like a chief executive, Pope Francis effectively devolved power on family issues.

headline.main: Rather Than Rules, Pope’s Document Gives License to Adapt
headline.print_headline: Rather Than New Rules, the Pope’s Document Gives License to Adapt
